name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (JMulv91)
description:
The is a simple maze game where the player must navigate the maze and find three keys that give off a spatialized rattle sound without being caught by the Enemy protecting the maze. The Enemy can detect the player by hearing for footsteps, the player can tip toe to soften their when an enemy is nearby.

Controls:

WASD to move, C for flashlight, Hold Shift to tip toe
